vv53:8.4: suvaṇṇachannā → suvaṇṇacchadanā (bj); suvaṇṇachadanā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); suvaṇṇacchādanā (pts-vp-pli2)
vv53:11.1: Jinavarapavaraṁ → jinapavaraṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | upehi → upemi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2)
vv53:11.3: avocahaṁ → avocāhaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr)
vv53:11.4: tathevakāsiṁ → ayaṁ gāthā sya1ed, sya2ed potthakesu
vv53:24.1: cidha → yedha (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); ye idha (mr)
